content: 12 cut yarn and tie off leaving a tail for sewing stars make 3 one in each color pink blue yellow 4mm hook begin with another mc and chain 1 in the mc put one single_crochet one double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet to make the first point of the star repeat 4 more times slip_stitch to the first single_crochet and chain 1 to secure cut a long tail for sewing pull the mc tail tight to secure assembly body take your two black body pieces and line them up right-side out here you have the option to just single_crochet the two sets of stitches together or only do blo single_crochet to attach i personally chose the blo option but it will look fine either way blo single_crochet the panels together until you have about 3 inches left stuff with poly-fil or your stuffing of choice pack the stuffing in there tight and continue to stitch the panels together slip_stitch back to the beginning st and tie off leave a tail so you can sew it in and hide it in the pillow eyes i personally used some quilting pins to skewer the eyes and pupils onto the pillow to see how they would look before sewing them on i suggest doing this so you can accurately assess where the pupils should be placed on the whites and where the eyes as a whole should be placed on the pillow take the pupils and sew them onto the whites of the eyes a little off center you want them to look slightly cross-eyed upon finishing once your pupils are sewn on sew the whole of the eyes on the front of the pillow body placement takes a few tries to get right but you will want about an inch of space separating the eyes and a little higher than you think is necessary stars sew the stars on the body underneath one of the eyes and place in a staggered position you re finished now you have a
